name: Dwarf De-Dwarf
description:
(Bit of a game breaking bug with the browser version atm)

(DOWNLOAD HAS A LESS BROKEN VERSION) (i think)

Welcome to the Dwarf De-Dwarf Christmas Training Program!

Descend down a mineshaft, mine gold, and craft presents!

After 5 minutes, you must then do the opposite of what you've just done. You must De-Dwarf, by dismantling the presents and breaking them down to their natural form to return the ore to the mines.

How many presents can you make, and how many can you dismantle, before the time runs out?

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement

E - Actions

Q - Switch Character

ESC - Main Menu

CREDITS

Alex Saunders - Programming/Game Design

JazzyLightning - Art - Jazzy (@JazzyLightning) / Twitter

Dylan - Sound Design/Music

Made for Yogscast Game Jam 2021
